website_summaries.verdict: At a fraction of the price of other models, this canister vac is a great choice for the budget-conscious consumer.
pros: A trusted brand in the industry that offers versatile cleaning
Has all the features of similar models at a bargain price
cons: Suction is slightly more powerful on hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Great. Purple is better than the maroon
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these vacuums. My first one (maroon one) would tend to flip over easily, but the purple one has larger wheels and does not seem to have that problem. I prefer a bagged vacuum over baggless. Much easier to just throw out the bag rather than emptying and cleaning it. The bags aren’t very expensive and last a very long time. Their customer service is great too. I thought mine was missing the crevice tool so I called and they sent one right away. However, unlike the maroon one, the crevice tool was actually underneath the vacuum. Very lightweight, very powerful, and expensive. Great little vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum for the price
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST VACUUM FOR THE PRICE! I was debating between this and Miele vacuum. Wanted to give it a try since it is way cheaper than Miele. This one is absolutely worth the money! It has an amazing suction power and clean hardwood and rugs perfectly. I vacuumed for 3 hours after getting it in the mail! It comes with 3 different heads (the regular for floor, skinnier for tight spots and one with brush on it. I use the brush end on window sills, cabinet doors, base boards and so on. I have a two story house and I have no issues using this on the stairs. If you are thinking about this -just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not pickup carpet mess
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum was Sergio. I’ve used it three times. It’s just sitting in the closet. The vacuum is loud and doesn’t pick up much of anything. The hose does not stay attached . Horrible buy . I should have known not to buy a bissell! This is a complete waste of money. The vacuum is bulky and Isn’t easy to maneuver either. Advertises that it picks up carpet and hardwood but doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: MermaidLyfe711

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: The extension pole comes apart from the hose. There's nothing to keep it in place.  Sad!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works better than my Dyson V11 which was really expensive. That thing is a real pain in the butt for many reasons, and I'm having buyer's remorse. Anyway, this is a good lightweight vacuum with good suction that doesn't get clogged every 5 minutes. It moves easy along the floor. I like the retractable cord, and you can adjust the airflow. That's a plus on rugs. It picks up things the Dyson wouldn't. I hate to rag on Dyson, but for $60, this vacuum cleaner is head and shoulders above it. The only problem I had is that the handle will come off while you're vacuuming if it's not in there really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Schellin

customer_reviews.title: Decent little vacuume,  but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros - the floor brush is well designed for hard floors. My old vacuum stuck to the floor at anything over medium suction. I can turn this one up all the way for good suction and not have it stick to the floor. Light weight and compact; easy to store. Looks nice. Cons - the hose is inflexible and made of cheap, stiff plastic. The hose doesn't have a latch where it enters the telescoping wand. It comes loose or falls off while working. I had to tape it on with electrical tape. Not something I expect to have to do on a new item. I can't rate stairs or carpet because I don't have either.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: light weight with good  suction
customer_reviews.text: this works, especially for a small one bedroom apartment fully carpeted living room and bedroom. I purchased this for the parimeter of the apartment, where my upright could not reach and i trashed it. There is no motor in the want, but, it picks up and for the kitchen and bathroom it works and isn't clunky. It will get into the nooks and crannies and window sills and the bottom of cupboards. Now you are going to think it's a toy at first, but give it a chance. I would still like to have an upright for the middle of the room, but that's a lazy comment.
customer_reviews.author: mary a.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bare floors, not designed for carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet little lightweight vacuum for bare floors. The adjustable handle makes it a kid friendly vacuum for training little helpers 😊 ( my three year old can easily maneuver this vacuum, but it’s great for a grown up to use, too). Please note that this is fine for the occasional area rug but NOT the right vacuum for carpeted floors.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great lil sucker
customer_reviews.text: I am just blown away with some of the negative reviews. It took longer to open the box than it did to put together. Assembly was one of the complaints. Another was suction. Broken plastic wand (the wand is metal). One reviewer was just getting down on the 2154A purple vacuum and even sent in a picture to make her point. Picture was of a completely different (green looking vacuum cleaner). If you gotta rant be right. My wife of 57 years loves this vac and that's all the review I need. Sixty bucks and a happy wife. Can't beat it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: I like the bags.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'll write more if anything happens. Did not eat my area rug or rip up my woven rug like other vacuum cleaners have. Seems to be a good pick so far....
customer_reviews.author: Cicily Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Better for just wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was expecting, the suction is good, but the push pull power on area rugs is bad because the foot has not roll motor to help, I ended up pulling so hard the connection between the hose and metal rod keeps coming apart, I want a vacuum with good suction that can do hard wood and carpet. My smaller rugs get totally lifted off the ground on max power, I guess I can try minimum power but fear the suction is not enough. I have pet hair and dirt due to living near a highway. May have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Krista H.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT LITTLE VACUUM :)
customer_reviews.text: For it's size and for the price. I say it's a WINNER. I have 3, one for my son's room at his dorm. one for my basement and for my husband home-office upstairs (You should see it :) ) I have a Kenmore which was a present, it's a great vacuum cleaner but it's a bit heavy having to carry up and down de stairs... This small but somehow powerful little thing does a great job helping us clean our home (and my son's dorm). Get one if you want an easy practical gadget
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for the price. Hard to locate proper replacement bags.
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum for the money: I was looking for a light weight canister vacuum under $100 that had good suction to clean up my 3 cats hair that is left all over my house. I have always prefered canisters & my old one broke. Seems most vacuums these days do not last very long. So I was set on not spending alot of money. The Bissell Zing delivered all the things I needed. Lightweight, great suction, & price under $100. The only reason I have left 4 stars is proper replacement bags seem hard to find & not having the exact right ones has caused problems with vacuum use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K.

customer_reviews.title: Zings are great
customer_reviews.text: Love this little canister vac and at this price you can get 2, one for upstairs and one for downstairs. What i like most is that these have bags...aftermarket bag makers work awesome.and are pennies Bags keep dust in the vac and are super easy to dispose, unlike the vortex bag-less vacs...half the micron dust gets pumped right back into the room!
customer_reviews.author: S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of money DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I got this vacuum a month ago. Don’t waste your money on this! IF I COULD HAVE GIVEN IT O STARS I WOULD HAVE. The handle doesn’t stay in the vacuum and is constantly falling out in the middle of vacuuming. Unless you’re a VERY SHORT person, (by the way, I’m 5’6”) you have to bend down to use it. It is sad when I have to use my 30 year old vacuum, which I was going to replace with this one ( lucky for me I haven’t thrown it away yet)...My old one is a Hoover Futura! I will never get a Bissell again! The instructions were horrible too!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little bowling bag, but no crevice tool
customer_reviews.text: Really lightweight and easy to use, took five minutes to put together. I like the retractable power cord, and the click-telescoping tube attachment. The bag is really easy to install and remove. The unit came with a broad floor/carpet attachment which features a switch that reveals or retracts the carpet brush so you can go from floor to carpet without changing the head. It also came with a small, round brush attachment for furniture. Very disappointed that it didn't include the crevice attachment because that's why I bought this in the first place, to clean baseboards and corners. I'm through with upright vacuums, this little thing is a champ. Send me a crevice tool, please!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews were correct - decent vacuum & attachments fall off
customer_reviews.text: It is a good lightweight canister vacuum. I bought it to replace my similar old one. Other reviewers complained that the attachments fell off the hose because they're only held on by friction. My old vacuum had the same problem so I figured I could live with it. And yes this vacuum has the same trouble. But I still like it more than the upright bagless one. I love having a bag to just pop out, and a hose that allows me to vacuum cars and stairs more easily.
customer_reviews.author: NoGiftsPlease

customer_reviews.title: Zing Works Great and Relatively Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to supplement an upright vac in a second home. I hate using an upright vac for tile, hardwood, stairs, car interiors, wall art, window blinds, furniture, etc., etc. To me, uprights are only good for carpet. This inexpensive vac does a great job. It has excellent suction and it is relatively quiet (or more accurately, way less loud) than my Eureka The Boss Mightymite. The Mightymite has me going to my gun safe for hearing protection. I haven't used Zing much yet, but so far I'm favorably impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I got this Vacuum because I was looking for something inexpensive and light weight. It has a lot of suction power that is adjustable. Great on wood and tile floors. Ok on Carpet, gets the job done, but an upright Vacuum like the Dirt Devil Upright models are better if you have a lot of carpeting. A great basic/spare Vacuum for smaller spaces, light cleaning, and spaces without a lot of carpet. I would Not recommend if you need a Vacuum for every day use, I would go with a more heavy duty Vac in that case. The Quality is good for the price, can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this one, cannot believe it is so cheap yet has so great suction power! I also got a $$$ Dyson cordless and a Neato robot for everyday maintenance while I will use this $50 vacuum as my heavy duty vacuum! It replaced my $200 Shark upright vacuum which is heavy. although Shark has lift-away mode but still heavy for me so I seldom clean my stairs ahaha ... Now this one is so lightweight and has similar, if not more, suction power, so will sell my Shark right away! :D My only complaint is that the cord is too short for clean living room and dining rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jidan

customer_reviews.title: Good for it’s price
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, obviously not the best but it’s good for what it’s worth. The quality is quite poor, low quality plastic. The cord is too short so you’ll need an extension cord for this. The pole is too short as well and it breaks my back, it’s like it’s designed for kids. It’s not good for carpets and rugs at all, I use a different vacuum for that. But the thing is, it’s so cheap so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: LA R.

customer_reviews.title: Bissell Zing Lightweight Bagged Canister
customer_reviews.text: The suction of the vacuum is great. My biggest problem is I can't get the parts off I cannot pull the rug portion off to put the furniture part on. I got the metal tubing after reading the reviews of the baggless canisters tubing is plastic and the complaint was the tubing came apart while vacuuming. I didn't want that, but, I also need to be able to change the parts. I have a Kenmore vacuum that I use downstairs and able to pull parts on and off. The Bissell Zing isn't an expensive vacuum, but you just have to be able to put on and take off the various parts it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Good value at a good price
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews of many vacuum cleaners I decided not to spend a fortune since almost all are plastic. Since I could not find a bagless cleaner in my price range, this one seemed to fit the bill: cheap, light weight and requiring no belt changes. As some prior reviews observed, there is a design flaw. The plastic hose connection to the metal wand comes apart much too easily, especially when one is using the machine. Otherwise, the machine is well designed and the suction is quite good. All in all, though it is early days, I am quite satisfied with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Angten

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Ok so the only thing about this vacuum is that it suctions so well that it comes apart from the black plastic and the metal piece. Other than that it is THE BEST VACUUM I HAVE EVER OWNED!!! I just hold it where the two pieces meet and it stays put, but it can be frustrating at first. If you’re wavering just buy the thing. It follows you around easily and is small enough to fit in a cabinet. My dog hates it but hey, what can you do?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Kelsey Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing filter. updated- love it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review how well this works as it arrived missing the filter for it. Will update after I send the whole machine back and receive a replacement as they were unable to simply send the filter... update: Now that I have all parts I really love this vaccuum suction is great and not having to dump a dusty canister is great as well. If your like me with not a lot of storage for cleaning supplies this can do a lot without taking up the entire closet.
customer_reviews.author: CentralILMom

customer_reviews.title: Toy vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk that has good suction - so far. Cheap vacuum - hose keeps coming apart, has no beater bar so don't even bother if you need for rugs. I suppose it would be ok as an extra vac to use on quick cleaning of hardwood and vinyl flooring as long as you glue or tape the annoying hose parts together so they don't keep coming apart. Otherwise, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: L Roe

customer_reviews.title: Good for not carpet
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum has a lot of suction! It works great for hardwood/laminate/vinyl type floors. Though it does "work" for carpet, the lack of a rotating brush and no snap style connection for the tubes and attachments can make it frustrating to use for carpet and high pile rugs. We'll keep it as we have laminate in half the house, but will continue to use our stand up for the bedrooms and rug.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart in the middle of vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: The product I got works fine, but it seems to be missing a critical piece that keeps the metal hose attached to the machine. I looked at all the parts and customer photos, but I can't figure out what I'm missing. This results in the vacuum coming apart in my hands while I'm cleaning. Based on this alone, I cannot recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended to buy this from a friend. I bought one from my account for me and from another account for my cousin. Both of them didn’t resist more then 2 months. It doesn’t work anymore. Even when was working the suction wasn’t good, I had to go over and over to the carpet and floor to clean it. I don’t recommend this product. They better offer me a new one that it’s not ready to break in the first uses.
customer_reviews.author: Malvina Shushku

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be like the model before it, but it is terrible. It has little suction power. It sits empty in the closet now as I bought a different one. Very disappointed on how it doesn't clean our tile floors. I have to sweep before and after I use the vacuum. Spend the money and get a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable.
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight, you can carry it or roll it along behind you. I actually use it for a small office I clean with all hardwood floors. It gets into all the corners and under the desks. Variable speed air suction. Others have complained about the wand detaching, just push it in real hard and it stays. Very compact and transports easily. Used over a month now, so far so good. Manufacturer could improve the hard floor brush.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My dog has long hair and it wraps around the brush on my upright...I go over the carpet with the Zing and then the upright. It is double the work but works for me. The suction is fantastic, the cord is long and is easy to manuever around. The cord retraction is a bonus. Upon receiving my Zing it was missing the crevice tool but a phone call to customer service had it promptly on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I only got it yesterday but so far I’m very happy with it. I wanted a bag less system because dumping all that dust etc into my garbage just seems gross. I love how light weight it is so that I can carry it as I’m vacuuming. This makes maneuvering around furniture etc so easy. We live near the beach and have mainly hardwood floors and it did a great job on picking up sand and dust. So far the suction power seems good. It’s a small machine so it fits just about anywhere. And it’s really cute to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The only negative comment I have (and it is more my doing than anything else) is that, upon reading reviews and comments, I saw several people say this was great on carpets; an area rug maybe. We have wall to wall carpet and this is NOT the vacuum for that! Great suction, very lightweight. If you are tall...beware. I am 5'9" and I have to stoop over because the rod that attaches to the floor cleaner part is not long enough. I really do think though that this is a great little vacuum (if you have non-carpeted floors).
customer_reviews.author: Annie H.

customer_reviews.title: HOSE DOES NOT STAY IN
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed fine with this little canister but the hose not staying in the wand is a deal breaker. there is no locking device of any kind so it falls apart with use. We thought about duct taping it which would work but didnt seem reasonable for a brand new product. They should charge $10 more and put a lock on the hose. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Terrible on carpet
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that this would be awful on carpet. There's no power nozzle or brush roller to get into the nap. It's cumbersome to push and doesn't clean carpet at all. It might be ok for hard floors only, but the floor attachment is so narrow that it would take a while to do an average sized space. Sadly, we didn't try it out until just outside the 30 day window, so we are stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the ratings and found a lot of concern about the attachments coming undone because of the amount of suction this beast puts out. That sold me on it! I have only tile floors in my home so this is perfect. It's lightweight so I just carry it by the handle while I vacuum. My one concern is that the auto-return cord gave out in the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was lightweight and bagged. I hate the dust that flies out of bagless when emptying. However, it does not work on carpet although the attachment has a carpet setting & my pile is low. The metal tube keeps falling off the hose. The 2 attachments won’t stay on. Cord is too short. Canister keeps tipping over when I vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to operate
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient vacuum for an apartment. The hose attachments work well but using the regular vacuum itself is hard to operate. You really have to put some force into it. I'm 33 & having a hard time. It would br worse for anyone much older. Its a shame because its a good size vacuum and the hoses work just fine but based on the regular vacuum part I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: LMC1787

customer_reviews.title: don't have high expectations...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is just ok... It was so irritating every time the connections on the hose would disconnect 😡 Suctioning was good. I’m contemplating returning but also keeping because it works and maybe my expectations are too high for the price that I paid for the vacuum? I wish I had it in my budget to purchase a dyson...
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Quit on second bag.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had less than 2 years with little use, we are only on our second bag. I went to use and it will not turn on. We are past the 1 year warrantee so we are out of luck. Very frustrating to have something that still looks new quit working. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, great price!
customer_reviews.text: When they say light weight, they mean it! The handle is plastic, but the connection handle is metal. It can change in length. The price is awesome too. I've been looking for a canister vacuum for a while now and all of the in store ones are triple the price of this one! I don't have any carpet, and I hate sweeping because you basically just chase the dirt around the house. The attachments that it comes with are really nice too. Each one has a place to go on the vacuum so you're not storing the attachments elsewhere. My mom now wants to purchase this for her home!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight high suction vacuum for bare floors, doesn't do so well on carpet, I like the retractable cord
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: No beater bar, so low carpet or hard surfaces only
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be, but that may be a plus. Pulled it out of the box and was ready to go. Great suction!! Lifted the carpet up as I used it. Love the cord rewind and the wand attaches to the base for storage. No beater bar on it, so probably not the best for deep carpets. Also no crevice tool. I will look for one online. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: kerri D Gehring

customer_reviews.title: Suck the chrome off a trailer hitch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I live in a 7x19' container here in lovely Afghanistan. I have area rugs from the local bazaar. For the last two years I've used a Dirt Devil bag type hand held vacuum. I noticed recently it wasn't doing too well so I ordered the Bissell. Boy oh Boy. It's almost like having new rugs Light weight and easy to move around. Powerful suction.
customer_reviews.author: Expatchic

customer_reviews.title: Great value in a powerful, compact canister vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Great power for such an affordable canister vacuum. I live in my Airstream trailer and space is limited so I needed something small and reasonably priced. I was definitely surprised by this one. Only con is the attachments don’t lock on but it hasn’t been an issue, just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great mobility, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really fast. Well packed. Bag was already in it. Works really well. It's super lightweight, and easy to handle. I hope they never stop making these little snappy vacuum cleaners with the bags. Sometimes that's all one needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this small vacuum cleaner has exceeded my expectations.. great suction for vacuuming most surfaces.. does not same performance as a higher end vacuum cleaner but for the money, a great purchase.. highly recommend for lighter, general purpose vacuum cleaning ... Thx!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great On Berber Carpet
customer_reviews.text: I needed a vacuum that would be lightweight, clean berber carpet, have great suction and easy for storage. This vacuum is everything and more i wanted it to be and I appreciate how effortless it is to carry it from each room.
customer_reviews.author: genecelh

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This little vaccum is such a gem. When my old bissell vaccum died, I knew that I was going to be able to get the same product. Only this one is exceptionally better than my old one. Better suction all around better quality. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise  Winnick-Holady

customer_reviews.title: Love bissell in general but not this product
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed with the vacuum. I kept it because it’s easier than returning but the bissell featherweight for $22 works much better and is less cumbersome... if this was more powerful then it would be worth dealing with the short cord and stiff hose, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kouveliotes

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Has good suction when the hose stays on the pipe. The long pipe just sticks into the hose so it falls out often. Should have some locking mechanism to keep it locked in place. Its light enough to pull around no problem. Cord length good. Would not purchase again due to hose coming off long pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Trever J Bulles

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - easy process of replacing vacuum bag - button for retracting cord Cons: - No lock mechanism to stop the metal part of the wand from falling off the tube (I've scratched my floor and also given myself a number of bruises because of this) - Dust/hair gets stuck on the brush part of the vacuum Conclusion: you get what you paid for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is the bag size and it’s it easy to find?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little vacuum but the electrical cord is too short. The hose is too stiff. However, for the money it’s pretty powerful. I like how small it is. I didn’t like having to call the company to find out the size of the bag to be hammered into buying them from the company directly. The bags are over priced. I still have not found out the bag size so I can have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: AmaZING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! Fantastic price and an awesome product. Sucks up everything on the floor, even some stray legos on accident and had to dig them out of the bag. Easy to carry around and the extendable silver handle is great! Comes with 3 attatchments, the wide bristle one, which can go between hardwood and carpet with ease using the button on the attatchment, a small circle brush and a thin nozzle. Even an auto rewinding cord!
customer_reviews.author: Kami J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product At A Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: It is, in fact, a very good product. Does a very good job on hard surfaces, and a decent one (it does not have a ‘beater brush’) on carpeting. My only disappointment is that occasionally it may disassemble (attachments to the hose) while vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Alwazlrng

customer_reviews.title: This Vacuum Really Surprised Me!
customer_reviews.text: I was in shock at how well this vacuum was designed and how well it works. I was hesitant when I saw how small it is. I have two small children who drop more crumbs than they eat and thought it would never be able to keep up. I was wrong. It is very light, rolls well, and has great suction. I only like to buy bagged vacuums and this is the best one I've ever used. It even has a button to automatically roll up the cord. Also I love how there is no rolling bar on the rug attachment for long strings and hair to get wrapped around. I'm very impressed with Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: LOL it made two women who are so knit picky very happy. Trust me that’s saying a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother’s camper. She needed one small enough to store in a small compartment. She absolutely loved it. The suction is amazing. My Mom had my aunt try it and I ended up ordering her one. There only wish was that a beater brush would make this vacuum perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vikkilo

customer_reviews.title: great vac for the money
customer_reviews.text: regarding the problem reported by others who complained about the hose and floor wand coming apart, easy fix for that...just wrap a single layer of painter's tape around the end of the hose, then insert into the wand. Stays together until you pull apart, tape easily removes if desired.
customer_reviews.author: sr

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccum for
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vaccum for 5 months and it has worked very well. Suction is good, its a good price, its very lite weight my kids 8 and 4 can use it mayor plus. It has done very well very pleased. Its great for laminate floors, I use it everyday and its worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Angelita

customer_reviews.title: Love this cannister
customer_reviews.text: I only have hardwood floors, and this little guy cleans them like a champ. With the variable suction, I can also gently get rid of cobwebs and cat hair on curtains. It also lets me eliminate dog hair on furniture.
customer_reviews.author: MzWort

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this a 2 is because it does have great suction. But the handle does not stay on and the crevice tool and dust tool were not with it. Just got it today and the hose comes apart everytime i pull it backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweeper
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one had to buy again cause I dropped other one downstairs ouch:(. But it’s a great sweeper very powerful love the adjustable airflow suction can sweep throw rugs without them getting sucked up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but this thing is awesome! We have 100% hardwood in our house so ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this thing is awesome! We have 100% hardwood in our house so I wanted something without a brush but that would still find the gunk in cracks. This does exactly that!! I often sweep before vacuuming just because we have so much crap drug into the house however this does the job I bought it for and for a minuscule of the price of others.
customer_reviews.author: Swedla

customer_reviews.title: love the adjustment handle.
customer_reviews.text: excellent little vacuum. just the job just as needed. no problem,love the adjustment handle and dust bag.i don't care for dirt cup vacuums much.even though i love my pet shark,both holds their own.
customer_reviews.author: My order

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and it works
customer_reviews.text: Cute and lightweight and small. I wish it had come with instructions because it took me a couple of times to realize how it expands. Sometimes the hose part falls off, which I don’t love, but overall this is great, and I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for our small cottage! The sand was a problem, not with this lightweight vacuum is easy to use on stairs and get the job done, Love it was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: jcfunke

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: Whoah!!!! This little vacuum has some MAJOR SUCTION POWER. I first bought the bagless version. I’ve never been a big fan of bagless vacuum cleaners, but the reviews all spoke of it’s tremendous suction power so I gave it a try. I LOVE it, except cleaning filters and emptying canister. Then I found this vacuum and someone said it is basically the bagged version of the one I have. And it is!!!! I am not disappointed. With 4 teenage boys, I need all the help I can get. Thanks, Bissell.
customer_reviews.author: William Renz

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of power for something so lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is so lightweight and easy to maneuver I love it. It's been working perfectly and really sucks up the ton of dog hair that accumulates in my house! Great vacuum, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiggerbb59

customer_reviews.title: Suction Is Great
customer_reviews.text: The suction is excellent on this. I however feel like it is hard to maneuver around unless you’re on bare floors. It did not move around well on my rug or couch. They also had only sent me 2 bags with it, but they did and refund me some money so that I could get more. I just expected it to be better than it is with moving it around.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny S.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is great, the small size is great for my needs and space. The only complaint I would have is there is no way to attach/store the attachments when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very good. The only thing I hoped it would include would be an attachment for furniture. Otherwise, it's a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: qigirl

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum has amazing suction and is very lightweight. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the cord doesn't snap back in place without being guided and the back storage cover has to be pressed on hard to stay shut but otherwise an excellent purchase. So nice to have a bagged vacuum again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Zitka

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Good power, follows well, adequate tools. Can be loud. Biggest disappointment is that the hose end is metal and the wands are plastic which results in the wands falling off of the hose from time to time. We have taped ours together.
customer_reviews.author: P. Plumb

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for,Powerful little motor but not put together very well,Basically use it as you would a sweeper if you’re looking for a true vacuum cleaner look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: It is very lightweight which is good if you are going up and down stairs. It flips over much to easily. It works OK but after having Electrolux machines most of my life I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction is strong
customer_reviews.text: Not as flexible as I'd like. Awkward to use because it doesnt bend where I need it to. I'm taller and even extended, it isn't quite long enough. It has great suction!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for pet hair clean
customer_reviews.text: All good but the connection part seems to be not very reliable, it keeps on loosing. I bought this to clear my dog’s hair, works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Song Wu

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working altogether in about 5 weeks after 1st use!
customer_reviews.text: Underestimated the annoyance of the major design flaw that another reviewer described as the hose extender does detach all of the time. For this price point, the suction power is terrific but everything else offsets it as serious negatives, and ceasing operating altogether in just a few weeks kills it for me ... would not recommend that anyone purchase this Bissell unit. It did "Zing" me for $57.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Barbosa DaCunha

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick clean-up... strong suction for such a small, and light weight vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: problems with hose & handle staying together & plastic broken that holds hose to brushes.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum hose has already broken in one place ( where the hose is supposed to connect to the floor brush attachment - both the plastic on the hose and the plastic on the brush) and the hose will not stay together. where the metal meets the hose. I've owned it less than 5 mos. How do I fix this? Duct tape? Is there any warranty for hose breaking and not fitting in less than 5 months? I live in a small 1 bdrm apt and vacuum only small area rugs and tile floors. Help! So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood.  Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Extremely lightweight with great suction power. Fantastic on hardwood floors. Quiet and convenient. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jmn27

customer_reviews.title: Portable vacuum with disposable bags.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, conveniently small. I was looking for vacuums with disposable bags because of my allergies, so I don’t have to bother to open and empty a dirty, dusty canister. Cleaning the vacuum is minimized this way. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable plug-in
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the wand keeps separating from the handle while I'm vacuuming. It needs a button-stop or something. It is so light weight (has to be for this low price) that I can easily carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: pamd

customer_reviews.title: Great suction! Excellent small vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent compact vacuum! The suction is unbelievable! To do rugs and short pile carpet, I put suction on medium. Really excellent on hardwood. I have 5 long haired dogs and it handles the hair without clogging up. Best vacuum I’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: April Sark

customer_reviews.title: Tiny powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This tiny little vacuum has so much suction! I have noticed that the wand doesn't stay attached like some reviewers have said, but I think that's not a big deal if it sucks up the mounds of dog hair in my house. And it does!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: It's just a large dust buster
customer_reviews.text: Fisher Price makes more substantive vacuums. Mine arrived in a box with loose cat/dog treats. Gross. Hate it, but too much of a pain to box it back up and send it back. Will try to sell at a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: C. Markham

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Flops all over, power cord is too short, handle of floor attachment CONSTANTLY comes apart and falls either into wall, on floor or on your feet. I have always liked Bissell, but this one is terrible and it's past my return date or I would definitely return it. My whole first floor is wood, along with my staircase, so I needed a vacuum with a floor attachment, but this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Ok vacuum but you are going to keep putting the tools back on
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the fact that it's lightweight and easy to maneuver and the retractable cord is EVERYTHING. But the hose won't stay connected to the metal tool to save anyone's life. I constantly have to keep putting it back together it is definitely a nuisance. Also no crevice tool was included very disappointed in that
customer_reviews.author: Twentyonewingsmomz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I like basic, functional vacuums that work great and this is perfect for me. Does the job great, excellent suction and cleaning - I use on tiles, rugs and furniture. Very happy, this is the second one I've bought and I'd get another if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks but not in the way a vacuum should
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The cord is short so it's not great for large rooms. The suction isn't great and I end up having to sweep with a broom after vacuuming. It works okay on the carpeted stairs but I bought it for my wood floors so I will probably just ditch it and stick to using a microfiber broom.
customer_reviews.author: Tiredchica

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Lightweight, easy to transport, plenty of suction. I do stairs and my vehicle with it and it works great. Also have multi cats and dogs. Still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to find bags that fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum but finding replacement bags makes it too big of a pain. Amazon sells replacement bags but reviews show that they are all counterfeit and poor quality. You can order them from Bissell for around $20 with shipping for 3. That will only last you a couple months if you you don’t vacuum often.
customer_reviews.author: Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good little canister vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, floor attachment is cheap. Love the retractable cord. Easy to change the bag. Manufacturer sent replacement of missing edger and duster without grief. Good little canister vacuum for what we use it for: stairs, edging, hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: Impressive suction!!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is small but mighty. The suction is fantastic. I've only had it a week but I've used it every day and it's been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction.
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised by the suction power of this little light-weight vacuum. Easy to assemble. So far it's working fine and for the price I don't know how I could expect more.
customer_reviews.author: sym

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Really strong suction. I wanted a canister vacuum and bags. This is small, lightweight but works amazingly well
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Best tiny vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing vacuum! The power is unbelievable for such a small piece. I highly recommend this, not for the whole house things but couches, stairs, cars l, quick jobs!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Lewis MA

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok, but the edging tool was not included. Please send that tool
customer_reviews.text: When I unboxed it, there was no edging tool (circled in the picture of the manual). Please send the edging tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time and money with this one. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks on carpet. Do not waste your money. Its a pos. Doesnt even stay together. Keeps coming unattached and the cord is short af.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Small Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum, it's perfect for my stairs, which is why I wanted this one. I don't mind the bags either, no more shaking out the dirt and inhaling all that dust with my bagless!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Machowski

product_meta.title: BISSELL Zing Lightweight, Bagged Canister Vacuum, Purple, 2154A
product_meta.description: Color:Purple Bagged| Style:Zing CanisterThe Bissell zing bagged canister vacuum makes it easy to take powerful mess removal from one room in your home to another. It features a large, 2.5L-capacity bag to allow you to tackle messes large or small across both carpets and hard floors. The compact and lightweight design along with swivel steering make maneuvering around furniture and between rooms a snap. The easy-to-remove bag allows you to quickly change bags without the hassle or mess of a Bagless vacuum. The included tools and telescopic wand let you clean those hard-to-reach areas of your home with ease.
feature_bullets: Powerful variable suction gets the dirt low and high and is great for bare floors, rugs and above-floor cleaning
Easily go from cleaning carpets to hard floors with the flip of a switch
Automatic cord Rewind for quick cord storage with the push of a button
Easy-to-remove dust bag without the mess or hassle of emptying a Bagless vacuum
Complete with dust bag and pre-motor and Post-Motor filters to help capture more Fine dust and particles. Filters are washable and reusable

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,132 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
